article_title: Could Humana Grovel Any More To Get The Aetna-Humana Merger Approved By The Obama Administration?

article_metadata.description: Speaking about how he sees the future in the managed care industry, Humana CEO Bruce Broussard couldn't say enough good things about the value of the regulation the Obama administration and the ACA have done to make his business better and improve society.
article_metadata.author: Robert Laszewski

og.description: Speaking about how he sees the future in the managed care industry, Humana CEO Bruce Broussard couldn't say enough good things about the value of the regulation the Obama administration and the ACA have done to make his business better and improve society.
